text: Ikaweje awala waakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone, ni kunkolangaga Allah kwejinji, ni kulikulupusya achimisyene panyuma pakutendeledwa lupuso (pakwajanga achimakafili ni ilaanga pa ilaanga yao yaakwimba yakwagamba Asilamu). Sano pangakawapa tamanyilile awala watesile lupuso kwagalauchila kutagalauchile
